p: An example of the BOILED-Egg model (Brain or IntestinaL EstimateD permeation method) ( Figure 8) prediction of gastrointestinal (GI) absorption and BBB permeation of the same selected compounds have been exploited. Results shows that the compounds appeared with a red point in the yellow ellipse having high probability of brain penetration and are non-substrate of P-gp (PGP-).
